function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for mental health in the built environment","Impact":"Negative impact on occupants' mental well-being and productivity","Mitigation":"Incorporating biophilic design and greenery in spaces","Technologies":"Biophilia, greenery","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Architects, designers, and building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate air quality standards and monitoring","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality leading to health issues","Mitigation":"Implementing air quality standards, air filtration, and ventilation management","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, air quality monitoring, ventilation technology","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"}]}
